name: The Answers
description: The disappearance of the child made the authorities bothered. Because the child has an important clue about the secret behind the occurrence of the first apocalypse. Many say the secret is hidden behind The Grand Verge. But no one has ever set foot there. The place is cursed and full of danger. Is it true that the child went to The Grand Verge in search of answers? Or is The Authority actually hiding something there?
